title: Disconnected from the match and there is no record of the game.
body: My friend and I were disconnected from a game of normal draft around 20 min in. There is no record of it in either of our match histories and we were not given the option to reconnect.

replies.body:
It's a super top secret test program by rito to forcibly end players games without them taking a defeat during hotfix patching times, I'm just yanking your leg,
It's really unknown, rito won't talk about it even though similar cases like yours have been popping up since this event, Just let it slide, it's a game that "never" happened.
i just figured i would report it because the two of use havent seen this "bug" since season 3
